Posts.Content: WELL ALL GOT MY OP DATE 8TH OCTOBER HAVING MYSTECTOMY... BUT WHEN DOC SAID FULL AXILLARY NODE CLEARANCE I DIDNT ASK WHY I AM GUTTED IM NOT SHOCKED BY MYSTECTOMY THATS WHAT I WANTED BUT CLEARANCE I DIDNT WANT THAT I THOUGHT THEY JUST TAKE A FEW FOR TESTING AGAIN I DIDNT ASK WHY,,,  THEY WHERE QUICK TO  SAY LUNG WHERE CLEAR ON CT SCAN AND MY GLADSAND TUMPUR HAD SHRUNK BUT THATS IT................ FEEL LIKE A CHILD UNABLE TO ASK  I THINK MY BI=POLAR IS BACK ASWELL IM JUST RAMBLLING NOW SORRY DEBBIE
Posts.Title: WHY AXILLARY CLEARNCE ????

Posts.Content: WELL BEEN IN TOUCH WITH MY DOCTOR AND SHE DIDNT NO WHY I WAS HAVING AXILLARY NODE CLEARANCE SO ASKED THE BREAST CARE NURSE AND SHE SAID ITS BECAUSE I HAD CHEMO FIRST AND BECAUSE OF THAT THEY WOULD NOT BE-ABLE TO TELL WHICH IF ANY HAVE BEEN AFFECTED I HAVE TO GO TO THE CHEST CLINIC EVEN THOUGH MY CT SCAN WAS CLEAR BEACUSE I AM HAVING TROUBLE SHIFTIN  A COUGH SO ON SECOND LOT OF ANTI BIOTICS B4 OP ON THE 8TH THANKYOU ALL FOR REPLIES AND BIG HUGS FOR EVERYONE KEEP YOU ALL IN THE NO ABOUT OP BYE DEBS XXXX

Posts.Content: WELL IM HOME HAD MYSTECTOMY AND CLEARANCE GOT ONE DRAINAGE IN MODEL PATIENT LOL ASKED DOC HOW SURGERY WENT ANSWER WELL GOT WHAT I WAS AFTER OH WELL GET RESULTS NEXT MONDAY MAC NURSE SAYING NOW 5 WEEKS OF RADIATION HOPE NOT WELL ALL I CAN SAY IS OP WENT GOOD HARDLY ANY PAIN NEXT DAY ITS A FUNNY SENSATION TINGLING WELL LET U ALL NO RESULTS BY FOR NOW TAKE CARE DEBS

Posts.Content: WELL I HAVE ASKED THE QUESTION TO MY MC NURSE AND IT SEEMS I AM HAVING FULL CLEARANCE BECAUSE I HAD A 11MM LUMP IN LYMPH NODES WHICH HAS REDUCED TO 4MM SO WILL BE IN HOSPITAL TOMORROW FOR MYSTECTOMY AND CLEARANCE SO WONT BE ON FOR A WEEK  TALK SOON ALL BIG HUGS TO ALL DEBBIE XXXXX

Posts.Content: well results in lump 6cm  5out of 14 lympm nodes where effected start radiation in 2/3 weeks been uncomfortable since op but must be honest what  a brill job surgeon done nice and neat no stiches just steri strips im a bit cheesed of as nobody wants to give me grading say they dont do it  so based on size and lymph node involvement im saying grade 3 all i got of docs was it was locally advanced duhhhhhhhhhh and that means anyway thought i would post update roll on christmas my birthday lol 21 again 21 again
